EmailTemplate.name: View Sample Documents at LegalZoom.com
EmailTemplate.subject: View Sample Documents at LegalZoom.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent inquiry.
We prepare customized documents based on the information you provide when you place your order. However, generic samples are available for viewing on www.legalzoom.com for the following products:
- Divorce - Living Wills - Living Trust - LLC - Power of Attorney - Wills
Access sample documents by following these steps:
- Please visit this link: www.legalzoom.com - Click on the document you are looking for (Will, Power of Attorney, Living Will, etc.) - On the lower left hand side, click on the "GO" button under "View a Sample"
Please make sure that you do not have "pop-up blocking" software enabled, as it will prevent the sample from being displayed.
Please do not hesitate to contact us if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}.
Thank you once again for contacting LegalZoom, America's #1 online legal source.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
